page.title: 14BRECHIN CITY F.C.
page.content: Brechin City,a Scottish first division club,was founded in 1906 from Brechin Hearts and made their home at Glebe Park.This season they played 43 games (won 15,lost 17,drew 11)finishing 8th in the league and only made the 2nd round of the Scottish Cup.Hearts F.C.,a Premier League club, knocked them out of this competition.This game attracted 7100 supporters,only 191 below the ground capacity.Season 1982/1983 was the club's most successful year when they won the Scottish 2nd Division Championship. David Will,SFA president,is chairman, Ian Fleming player manager,John Fletcher coach and Jack Sunter physio. For two seasons Brechin has been sponsored by ICI/OCTO. Individuals have also sponsored the match ball and the boots for individual players. A social club also helps finances.
